title: Castle Crashers v1.5 + DLCs (working online)
description:
===================================================================================
Castle Crashers v1.5 + DLCs working online! Just install & play.
===================================================================================

Multilanguage


===================================================================================
About this Jimbus edition:
===================================================================================

- Custom installer compressed.
- The game is updated to the newest version (1.5) and includes the three extra characters: the blacksmith, the pink knight and Hatty Hattington.
- Texts in ten different languages (none of them has been deleted). 
- Online multiplayer works using Steam.
- You can save your progress.
- The libraries the game requires are also included.



===================================================================================
Instructions:
===================================================================================

1. Run CastleCrashers_v1.5+DLCs_online_JimbusEd.exe file to install the game.
2. Use the shortcut the installer places at the desktop.


===================================================================================
FAQ:
===================================================================================

Q: Does the multiplayer work?
A: Yes, it does.

Q: Do I need Steam to play?
A: Yes, Steam must be loaded, but the game has to be run from "castle.exe" (use the shortcut).

Q: Can I save the game?
A: Yes, you can.

Q: What DLCs are included?
A: All appeared until today.

Q: Does it work under Windows 8.1?
A: Yes, it does. 


Notice this is not an update but the full game. Do not install it over an existing installation.


===================================================================================
Special thanks to:
===================================================================================

Voksi Bulgarian and Revolt
